text: 2.14: 1 T 5.20Gu mbe garim, mbe Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuuŋ guareŋra zɨn vui fhu. Gu maaŋ muuŋgiap Pita khomara garav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu Zuda guma mbe ma. Ndu harigi fhaiŋ ŋgui gumgi mbui tɨvi zɨn vuav, ndu Zudaiŋ mbui tɨvi zɨn vui fhuvara. Ndu maaŋ mbuav, ndu thaŋ nzuav Zudaiŋ tɨva zɨn ŋgɨr zav, khaŋ tɨgav harigi fhaiŋ ŋgui gumgi ga nzuai?”
